judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to bear own costs.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Guy L. Warman, with him Metz, Cook, Hanna & Kelly, for appellant.
No oral argument was made nor brief submitted for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Scott, Appellant, v. Scott.
Argued September 27, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Guy L. Warman, with him Metz, Cook, Hanna & Kelly, for appellant.
No oral argument was made nor brief submitted for appellee.
December 20, 1971:
